cn.title: Name
cn.description: Arbitrary/Meaningful name of the RESTful Forward Rule

dcmURI.title: Target Base URL
dcmURI.description: Target URL without operation specific part, eg. http://<host>:<port>/dcm4chee-arc/aets/<aet>/rs/

dcmKeycloakServerID.title: Keycloak Server ID
dcmKeycloakServerID.description: Identifier of the Keycloak Server from which the access token shall be granted. If absent, no token will be sent.

dcmTLSAllowAnyHostname.title: TLS Allow Any Hostname
dcmTLSAllowAnyHostname.description: If the other server requires HTTPS and this config option is set to true the other serverâ€™s certificate is validated via the truststore, but host name validation is not done.

dcmTLSDisableTrustManager.title: TLS Disable Trust Manager
dcmTLSDisableTrustManager.description: If the other server requires HTTPS and this config option is set to true you do not have to specify a truststore

dcmURIPattern.title: Request URL Pattern
dcmURIPattern.description: Only forward requests which match the given Regular Expression. If prefixed with !, only forward requests which does not match the given Regular Expression.

dcmRSOperation.title: RESTful Operation
dcmRSOperation.description: Name of RESTful Operation which shall be forwarded to another archive instance.
